sense.name: a porous device that removes impurities from a substance
sense.examples: This brand of cigarette uses an active charcoal filter. Mary put a filter on her sink faucet to remove trace elements from the tap water. The winemaker used no filters during the fermentation process.

sense.name: an electrical device that alters the frequency spectrum of a signal
sense.examples: The engineer ran the signal through a low-pass filter. This headset has a noise-reduction filter.

sense.name: a plate or screen that selectively absorbs wavelengths of light
sense.examples: The photographer used a blue filter and a fast exposure for this picture. John put a special filter over the lens of his telescope in order to look at the sun. The clouds act as a filter and block certain wavelengths of sunlight.
